projects.title: VIZARD Tool
projects.bodyText:
- Developed A **Data Labeling Tool** for internal Jio Data science team to find raw data in image, text formats which helps data analysts to label data.
 - Developed a user interface for AI models
 - Real-time display of predicted results by AI models in the UI.
 - Successful creation of a user-friendly UI for AI model predictions with document uploads.
 - Implemented distinct roles for admin, super admin, and annotator in the data labeling tool

projects.title: User Management API
projects.bodyText:
- Developed as a Node.js API 
 - Specializes in **user authentication and management** Allows users to register securely 
 - Provides a seamless login process 
 - Implements access tokens for enhanced security 
 - Enables access to a list of registered users

projects.title: Data Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated on the development of a data analytics tool during my tenure with Jio AI CoE (Center of Excellence). 
 - Developed an in-house data analytics solution to safeguard the confidentiality of project data, opting for a custom approach due to privacy considerations. 
 - Provides a seamless login process 
 - Developed visually appealing charts and graphs to represent analytics data effectively 
 - Enabled users to access analytics features upon successful authentication
